Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide (FSAP) family. Brevinin subfamily.
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.17272268] Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli (MIC=16.32 μg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=8.16 μg/ml), Bacillus subtilis (MIC=8.16 μg/ml).Yeast:Candida albicans (MIC=4.08 μg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref:17272268]Non-hemolytic activity against rabbit red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Odorranain-D1 exhibites antimicrobial activities against all of the tested microbes including Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria and fungi. Has no hemolytic activity against red cell.

Literature.Title: Anti-infection peptidomics of amphibian skin.
Literature.Author: Li J, Xu X, Xu C, Zhou W, Zhang K, Yu H, Zhang Y, Zheng Y, Rees HH, Lai R, Yang D, Wu J.
